name: Super Swing Golf
description:
Yell out “fore!” with friends and family while taking virtual swings in Super Swing Golf™ for the Nintendo Wii™!

Taking full advantage of the unique Wii™ Remote, Super Swing Golf lets you take actual swings while playing on vibrantly colored fantasy golf courses.

Choose from a wide variety of golfers to suit your personality, but it’s up to you to put the ball in the cup!

Get your grip on Super Swing Golf today!
